name: DailyMathFacts
0:
”Alexa, Ask Math Facts to tell Daily Math Facts”
”Alexa, Ask Math Facts to tell Math Facts”
”Open Math Facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math facts
des:
This is a kids skill app. This is for all above 6+.

Math is used everywhere from shopping to school. Our normal skill include few basic Mathematical skill kids would learn in their schools. Our app also include a fun new skill call Star Math Facts. Few questions may be hard to solve. That's why we introduced star Math Facts that tells a easier more efficient way to solve a hard problem. At the end you will hear Alexa saying to go to web. You will be seeing a visual representation of what Alexa told you in action. Star Math facts will be updated every week.
